title: Middlekauff: Packers should fire McCarthy ASAP; Rodgers' inconsistency is a problem; Huge game for the Bears; Week 11 and Rams/Chiefs previews
itunes:title: Middlekauff: Packers should fire McCarthy ASAP; Rodgers' inconsistency is a problem; Huge game for the Bears; Week 11 and Rams/Chiefs previews
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 3 and Out with John Middlekauff is part of the Colin Cowherd Podcast Network. 3 and Out is an unfiltered podcast covering the biggest stories in the NFL and college football. John brings his unique perspective as a former NFL scout, NFL analyst and radio host. In this episode, John looks at Seattle's TNF win over the Packers, why Green Bay should fire Mike McCarthy ASAP, and why Aaron Rodgers' inconsistency is a problem. He also explains why this week is huge for the Bears and previews Week 11 and the Rams/Chiefs MNF regular season game of the year. As always, John answers all your listener listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
